attributes.action: Change Merlin Housing transfer policy to include the disabled
attributes.background:
We live in a flat up 30 stairs
Our 3yr old has Duchenne muscular dystrophy,he will spend most life in a wheelchair requiring 24hr care.
Applied for a housing transfer 10 months ago but while collecting evidence Merlin housing changed the criteria.
They have refused to move us to suitable property

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Merlin Housing, not the Government or Parliament. You can make a complaint to Merlin Housing here:

http://www.merlinhs.co.uk/make-a-complaint

That page also explains the actions you can take if you are not happy with the way that Merlin Housing handles your complaint.
